snippet.title: FAIRYMM: the Insomniac Beauty - Kickstarter Teaser 💜
snippet.description:
💜 PLAY DEMO FOR FREE ON KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fairymm/fairymm-the-insomniac-beauty 
🛒 WHISHLIST US ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1644000/FAIRYMM_the_Insomniac_Beauty

📜 Once upon a time, a new indie video game franchise reinventing fairy tales into creepy horror games! A Survival Point & Click where you play Aurora, in an anxiety-filled sleepy paralysis experience. Manage your senses and get through 10 restless nights, while trying to unveil the dark story, tale of the Insomniac Beauty. Your choices, her fate. 
But be aware, in the world of FAIRYMM, nobody lives happily ever after. 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

🔧 Currently developed on PC under Unreal Engine 4. 
Future releases ⏩ PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, VR, Tablet & Mobiles.
FAIRYMM: the Insomniac Beauty is the first project of Épidémika. 

🌐 VISIT OUR WEBSITE: https://www.fairymm.fr/
